title: [Zedarva's Weaponry]
[Zedarva's General Store]
description: Plain wooden walls rise from an unfinished wooden floor.  Just above a worn rug hangs a tattered merchant permit, and an uneven wooden ceiling completes the picture.  A badly scarred oak counter and a plain wooden table stand side by side in the middle of the room.
Beneath an uneven wooden ceiling, a tattered merchant permit hangs on one of the plain wooden walls.  A plain wooden table sits in one corner while a worn rug rests on the wooden floor.
